contact.title: CONTACT ME
contact.message: Want to build something together? That's great! Send me an email and I will get back to you as soon as possible!

resume.summaryText: Versatile Full-Stack Web Developer with 5+ years of experience designing, developing, and managing complex e-commerce sites and internal applications. Enjoys integrating technologies to solve problems. Passionate about approaching programming challenges from different angles and collaborating with others to create meaningful web applications. Outstanding verbal and written communication skills coupled with strong project management abilities.Hard working and able to multitask efficiently.Fluent in English and Spanish.
resume.fullStackDeveloper: Full Stack Web Developer, Senior Developer
suaveDesc: Design and develop applications that provide technical solutions for business challenges.
Perform website design and development for Suavecito Pomade and all subsidiary companies.
Maintain brand consistency and ensure quality across multiple websites.
Use Photoshop, Illustrator and InVision to prototype website/app designs.
Specialize in creating interactive user-friendly e-commerce websites on platforms like Shopify and WordPress.
Design, develop and maintain custom APIs and integrations.
Manage and maintain local and cloud servers and databases.
Build and maintain custom tooling to automate tasks.
Build and maintain web apps for reporting.
Update and create new product templates/layouts to fit new e-commerce needs as new products are added.
Utilize tools like Trello to manage schedule and assure on-time delivery of content.
Ensure proper management of product inventory through setup and deployment of inventory software.
Develop artwork and layout for print and digital signage.
Use Adobe suite to edit and arrange photos for advertising and marketing purposes.
resume.uci: University of California Irvine, Irvine, CA
resume.uciDesc: A 24-week intensive program focues on gaining knowledge and technical programming skills to build dynamic end-to-end web applications. Computer Science applied to JavaScript.

resume.occDesc: Coursework completed in Computer Science and Information Systems.

resume.gwcDesc: Coursework completed in Computer Science, Information Systems, Digital Media, and Graphic Design.
